responses.text: What are you working on here?

dynamic_line: I'm working on the Flesh. Most of the time.

responses.text: The flesh? So you are kind of a doctor?

dynamic_line: Oh not exactly, rather scientist. The Flesh is organic flesh-like matter designed for wide variety of purposes. In short, it can be grown into various tissues with various structure. It can create muscles, bones, organs, glands, even whole self sufficient micro and macro organisms.
My lab and my home. I created this lab long time ago when I decided to do something useful. I believed that research on stem cells, cultured meat and synthetic organs would solve many problems.

responses.text: That sounds interesting, what kind of problems you had on mind?
You created this whole lab yourself?

dynamic_line: Well nothing too specific in particular. Back then, goal of my research was anything from efficient edible meat production, growing organs for transplatology, various therapies with stem cells and most importantly getting funds for my living and playing with life.

responses.text: You created this whole lab yourself?

dynamic_line: Oh yes, it took many years to gather funds, collect gear and set it all up down here. Through years of my research I was leading various projects and collected quite a lot of funds. Later on I had to tightly lock this place and move permanently to other facility.

responses.text: Quite remarkable achievement, what forced you to move from here?
That sounds interesting, what kind of problems you had on mind?

dynamic_line: I could either move with my research to more secured facility or loose control over my research on the Flesh. I wasn't happy by that, boss hovering over my shoulder, evaluating my work was hard to accept. Though considering how it all turned out I'm glad they forced me back then.

responses.text: So the work under someone wasn't so bad?

dynamic_line: Oh it was, it's just that when everything went to hell, we had a little accident there. Instead of me having little accident here.
